page.title: 15ECOLOGY PLANTLIFE
page.content: {TREES AND FLOWERS Most of the trees in our area are deciduous such as oak,ash, sycamore, beech and hawthorn. The latter is used for hedging although many hedges have been torn up to make fields bigger to take the big machinery. There are some evergreens like yew,pine and holly. There are many common wild flowers like cowslip,hedge parsley,clover, dandelion,nettles,vetches,campion,hop trefoil,daisies and buttercups. Many people enjoy growing flowers in their gardens. The soil being boulder clay is especially suitable for growing roses.Other garden flowers are delphinium,lupin,sweet pea,peony, aster,chrysanthemum and dahlia. There are many different grasses growing on the roadside such as meadow foxtail,meadow grass,couch,field brome, Timothy grass and cock's-foot.
